scripts.deploy-cloud: cd cloud && sam build && sam deploy --profile uni-connector --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "docker-compose up" "cd backend && npm run client:start" "cd frontend && cross-env PORT=3001 npm start"
scripts.start-connecting: cd cloud && sam build --profile uni-connector && sam local invoke --parameter-overrides 'ParameterKey=ENVIRONMENT,ParameterValue=local' --profile uni-connector
